hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Salim reported with the same chain of transmitters:He who observed twelve voluntary rak'ahs, a house will be built for him in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ السُّنَنِ الرَّاتِبَةِ قَبْلَ الْفَرَائِضِ وَبَعْدَهُنَّ وَبَيَانِ عَدَدِهِنَّ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the regular sunnah prayers before and after the obligatory prayers, and their numbers
